long_description: Certified organic, non-GMO, vegan and gluten-free, the Pure Organic Ancient Grains bar is made with an exclusive ancient grain blend that deliver a complete source of protein, fiber and antioxidants. Combining healthy grains such as quinoa, amaranth, flax and hemp, these crispy and delicious bars offer lower sugar and sodium counts than most energy bars. Chocolate Chunk Nut bar contains 160 calories, 5g protein and 6g sugar. Triple Berry Nut bar contains 160 calories, 5g protein and 8g sugar.
short_description: Certified organic, non-GMO, vegan and gluten-free, the Pure Organic Ancient Grains bar is made with an exclusive ancient grain blend that deliver a complete source of protein, fiber and antioxidants.
